Package geoquant

Class Summary
Alpha The Alpha geoquant is defined on vertex and is used to modify the calculation of edge length as follows: l_ij = alpha_i * r_i^2 + alpha_j * r_j^2 + 2 * r_i * r_j * eta_ij An alpha geoquant does not depend on any other quantities.

Area  
ConeAngle

DualArea

EdgeHeight  
Eta  
FaceHeight  
Geometry The Geometry class is a static class that serves as a medium between geoquants and the currently loaded triangulation.
Geoquant The Geoquant class serves as an abstract description of a geometric quantity that exists on a Triangulation.
GeoRecorder The GeoRecorder class records changes in geoquants, most notably during flows.

Enum Summary
Geometry.Dimension The Dimension enum provides a way to pass information about the dimension in use through methods and classes.
